Textual source code copied from the Thunderbird default theme is licensed according to the Mozilla Public License Version 2.0 (the "MPL"); you may not use it except in compliance with the MPL. release_notes.en-US:
Fixed:

- Tagged mail color not showing on "unselected-unread-tagged" emails in the thread pane.
